casebody.data:
Gerald BOURG, et al., Plaintiffs, *706Gerald Bourg; Reid Spangler; Michael Spears; Jesse Mendoza, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. UNION PACIFIC RESOURCES CO.; et al, Defendants, Union Pacific Resources Co.; Union Pacific Resources Group, Inc. Severance Plan, Defendants-Appellees. Gerald Bourg, et al., Plaintiffs, Gerald Bourg; Reid Spangler; Michael Spears; Jesse Mendoza, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. Union Pacific Resources Co.; Anadarko Petroleum Corp.; Anadarko Energy Services Co.; Union Pacific Resources Group, Inc. Severance Plan Administrator, Defendants-Appellees. No. 05-30235.

Summary Calendar.

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Decided July 19, 2005. Christopher Leonard Zaunbrecher, Briney & Foret, Lafayette, LA, for Plaintiffs-Appellants. Holly Harvel Williamson, Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld, Houston, TX, Stanley Weiner, Jones Day, Dallas, TX, George H. Robinson, Jr., Liskow & Lewis, Lafayette, LA, for Defendants-Appellees. Before REAVLEY, JOLLY and HIGGINBOTHAM, Circuit Judges. PER CURIAM: *

The judgment of the district court is affirmed for the reasons given by that judge in her ruling of January 25, 2005.

AFFIRMED.

Pursuant to 5th Cir. R. 47.5, the Court has determined that this opinion should not be published and is not precedent except under the limited circumstances set forth in 5th Cir. R. 47.5.4.
